dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create GetWorkers Request

enricher.doc:name: store user Id in record var 'snowUserId'

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create getRecords Request
Get User ID
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/java %namespace ns0 http://www.service-now.com/sys_user --- payload.ns0#getRecordsResponse map { Id: $.ns0#sys_id } when payload.ns0#getRecordsResponse is :object otherwise [{Id: null}]

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create insert Request
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/xml %namespace ns0 http://www.service-now.com/sys_user --- using (personalData = payload.workerData.personalData) { ns0#insert: { ns0#active : payload.workerData.employmentData.workerStatusData.active, ns0#city : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].municipality, ns0#country : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].countryReference.ID[1].value, ns0#email : personalData.contactData.emailAddressData[0].emailAddress, ns0#"first_name" : personalData.nameData.preferredNameData.nameDetailData.firstName, ns0#"home_phone" : personalData.contactData.phoneData[-1].formattedPhone, ns0#"last_name" : personalData.nameData.preferredNameData.nameDetailData.lastName, ns0#"middle_name" : personalData.nameData.preferredNameData.nameDetailData.middleName, ns0#state : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].countryRegionReference.ID[-1].value, ns0#street : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].addressLineData[-1].value, (ns0#"user_name" : payload.workerData.userAccountData.userName) when (payload.workerData.userAccountData != null and payload.workerData.userAccountData.userName != null), ns0#"zip" : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].postalCode } }

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Create update Request
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/xml %namespace ns0 http://www.service-now.com/sys_user --- using (personalData = payload.workerData.personalData) { ns0#update: { ns0#active : payload.workerData.employmentData.workerStatusData.active, ns0#city : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].municipality, ns0#country : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].countryReference.ID[1].value, ns0#email : personalData.contactData.emailAddressData[0].emailAddress, ns0#"first_name" : personalData.nameData.preferredNameData.nameDetailData.firstName, ns0#"home_phone" : personalData.contactData.phoneData[-1].formattedPhone, ns0#"last_name" : personalData.nameData.preferredNameData.nameDetailData.lastName, ns0#"middle_name": personalData.nameData.preferredNameData.nameDetailData.middleName, ns0#state : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].countryRegionReference.ID[-1].value, ns0#street : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].addressLineData[-1].value, ns0#"sys_id" : recordVars.snowUserId, (ns0#"user_name" : payload.workerData.userAccountData.userName) when (payload.workerData.userAccountData != null and payload.workerData.userAccountData.userName != null), ns0#"zip" : personalData.contactData.addressData[-1].postalCode } }
